title: Video: LULS – Young
body:
**LULS**, the new project from **The Big Pink’s** **Adam Prendergast** have already brought certain industry types out in sweats, and it’s guaranteed to only be a matter of time before some of them begin fumbling for their pens.

Debut track **Young** is more atmospheric than **Prendergast’s** previous work, and certainly more sonically considered. Rumbling crescendo’s and sugar coated industrial clunks are welded together to form a surefire indie anthem in waiting, complete with purposefully undecipherable video marks the first, and by no means the last we hear from **LULS**.
